edu.cccnj.FivePoints.Components.Light

Class TrafficLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cccnj.FivePoints.Components.Light.TrafficLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class TrafficLight
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    The TrafficLight changes its colors based on variable intervals.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrafficLight(int greenTime, int redTime, int yellowTime)
      Set the intervals for the trafficLight to run on, and assume that Green is the starting value.
      TrafficLight(int greenTime, int redTime, int yellowTime, LightColor initialColor)
      Make a traffic light with the default intervals and initial light color

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrafficLight

        public TrafficLight(int greenTime,
                    int redTime,
                    int yellowTime)
        Set the intervals for the trafficLight to run on, and assume that Green is the starting value.
        Parameters:
        greenTime - The amount of time the traffic light should be green.
        redTime - The amount of time the traffic light should be red
        yellowTime - The amount of time the traffic light should be yellow

      • TrafficLight

        public TrafficLight(int greenTime,
                    int redTime,
                    int yellowTime,
                    LightColor initialColor)
        Make a traffic light with the default intervals and initial light color
        Parameters:
        greenTime - The amount of time the traffic light should be green.
        redTime - The amount of time the traffic light should be red
        yellowTime - The amount of time the traffic light should be yellow
        initialColor - The intial color to set the traffic light to

        public void setInterval(LightColor color,
                        int interval)
        Set the interval of the color in the traffic light to a specified amount
        Parameters:

        interval - The interval to set

        Returns:

      • suggest

        public LightSuggestion suggest()
        Suggest what a car approaching this traffic light should do
        Returns:
        LightSuggestion.PROCEED if the yellow light is less than half way done, STOP otherwise.
